author: Simon Difford
description: Grappa is made to go with espresso coffee and adds its distinctive flavour to this cocktail originally made with vodka.
name: Grappa Espresso Martini
recipeIngredient: 2.5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
